definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Making peace with the establishment is an important aspect of maturity.
sentences.chinese: 与当权派达成妥协是成熟的重要表现之一。

sentences.english: He was waiting for the powers that is to decide what his next job would is.
sentences.chinese: 他在等待当权派给他分派下一工作。

sentences.english: Under the weight of these heavy manners, let the power fall.
sentences.chinese: 受够了那些沉甸甸的重压，打倒当权派。

sentences.english: During evolution, his ancestors were in the control group.
sentences.chinese: 进化时，他的祖先肯定是当权派。

sentences.english: You’re faced against the establishment and all the rules are against you.
sentences.chinese: 你面对的当权派和所有的制度都对你不利。

sentences.english: Grape finds her injured father-in-law in the desolate apothecary now sealed by the new authorities.
sentences.chinese: 在新当权派把守的荒地上，葡萄找到了受伤的公公。

sentences.english: It taught me more about the British Establishment.
sentences.chinese: 这使我对英国的当权派有进一步的了解。

definition: capitalist roader (person in power taking the capitalist road, a political label often pinned on cadres by the Red Guards during the Cultural Revolution)
within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)
the Narodniks, Russian populist group in the 19th century
